data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains data on CMV viral accumulation (µg virus/g tissue fresh weight) on melon plants infected by CMV with or without satRNAs (semicolon delimited format). Data was used to estimate CMV transmissibility and transmission parameters according to the experimetal regression of CMV transmissibility (F) on viral accumulation (V): F= 0,127707+0,000208373V (R^2=0.7680, P<0.0001), see Betancourt, et al., 2011. (Journal of General Virology, 92, 1930–1938).
Agriculture|Disease Biology|virulence evolution|Virus emergence|multi-host parasite|cucumber mosaic virus
